map



static immutable int MAPSIZE;
Size of map MAPSIZE*MAPSIZE

immutable int MINI;
It's hard to explain, MINI -- for mini map =)

struct MapCell;
Map cell struct

string localityType;
May be bank jungle mountains plain desert water shoal forest

bool open;
Does its escaped? No by default

struct fileMapCell;
Struct of map cells from the file

char localityType;
May be bank(B) jungle(J) mountains(M) plain(P) desert(D) water(W) shoal(S)

static MapCell[MAPSIZE][MAPSIZE] worldMap;
World map

fileMapCell[MAPSIZE][MAPSIZE] fromFile;
From-file map

void printMapMini();
Print mini-map

void printMapAll();
Print all map, its fucking large!

void printMapPart(ushort how);
Print a part of the map

void getMapFromFile();
Getting map from the 'world.map' file
